name: Grappy (Flash)
description:
This is my first game ever that I made without any tutorials. The game is inspired from a game that youtuber Dani. 

There will probably be a lot of bugs but hey.. It's a start :D 

It's a simple grappling platformer. The purple boys give you points and the red boys take away a life (from a total of 2). The lava will kill you immediately tho.
